lines.text: create string array x with size 100000
for i = 0 to n * 2 exclusive , read x [ i ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n * 2 ; i ++ ) { cin >> x [ i ] ; }

lines.text: for i = 1 to n * 2 exclusive , incrementing i by 2
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; i < n * 2 ; i += 2 )

lines.text: if x [ i ] is " rat " print x [ i - 1 ] print newline
lines.code: if ( x [ i ] == " rat " ) cout << x [ i - 1 ] << endl ;

lines.text: for i = 1 to n * 2 exclusive , incrementing i by 2
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; i < n * 2 ; i += 2 )

lines.text: if x [ i ] is " woman " or x [ i ] is " child " , print x [ i - 1 ] print newline
lines.code: if ( x [ i ] == " woman " || x [ i ] == " child " ) cout << x [ i - 1 ] << endl ;
